70010000068547.description:
Experience Tales of Xillia, remastered for the first time ever.

Dive into the magnificent world of Rieze Maxia as either Jude Mathis, an aspiring medical student from the capital, or Milla Maxwell, a mysterious woman accompanied by four powerful spirits.

Worlds Collide, Destiny Awaits

• Two Heroes, One Destiny
Follow the paths of Milla and Jude as they embark on their daring journey through Rieze Maxia, a wondrous land where mankind and spirits coexist in harmony.

• Partner Up with Dual Raid
Master the Dual Raid Linear Motion Battle System, mustering strategy and coordination to overcome action-packed battles in real-time combat. Team up with allies to unleash devastating combo attacks and unlock special support skills to overwhelm your foes.

• Witness the Dramatic Story with High-Quality Animation
Visit the gorgeous Rieze Maxia, revitalized by beautifully-rendered illustrations and animations.

• Quality of Life Upgrades
Explore with new quality-of-life updates including improved graphics, an auto-save feature, the ability to toggle encounters, early shop access, and more.

• An All-Around Experience
Xillia Remastered contains DLC launched alongside the original release, including costumes, useful items, and other fun extras.

*A Deluxe Edition is also available. Be careful of duplicate purchases.
70010000068547.name: Tales of Xillia Remastered

70010000070772.description:
Toziuha Night is a 2D side-scrolling action platformer with features of a metroidvania RPG. Travel through different non-linear maps set in a dark fantasy world; such as a gloomy forest, demon-infested dungeons, a ruined village and more!

Play as Xandria, a beautiful and skilled alchemist who, using an iron whip, fights against the most fearsome demons and other alchemists seeking to obtain a millenary power. To accomplish her mission, Xandria will use various chemical elements to perform powerful attacks and spells.

Features:

- Original symphonic music.

- Retro pixelart style as a tribute to 32-bit consoles.

- Test your skills by fighting final bosses and various enemies.

- Explore new areas of the map using different skills and improving your stats.

- Anime and Gothic style characters.

- Combine iron with other chemical elements to create alloys with different playable properties.

- A map with a minimum of 7 hours of gameplay.
70010000070772.name: Toziuha Night: Order of the Alchemists

70010000081412.description:
Descend into a frightful world of action-adventure in Mina the Hollower. Take control of Mina, a renowned Hollower hurtled into a desperate mission to rescue a cursed island. Burrow beneath hazards and monsters, whip foes into oblivion, and gear up with an arsenal of sidearms and trinkets. Explore a vast world filled with pixel-perfect graphics, masterful gameplay, beastly bosses, and infectious music. Encounter a cast of bizarre characters, search out secrets in an array of exotic locales, and illuminate the omnipresent darkness in Mina the Hollower, a brand new game from the developers who brought you Shovel Knight!

Features:
Hauntingly authentic 8-bit visuals in the style of Game Boy Color, refined for the modern era.
Modern touches abound: detailed animation, widescreen visuals, and rock-solid controls!
Leap, dodge, and burrow through the ground to battle monsters or navigate the world.
Lash at foes with your trusty whip, Nightstar- or choose from an arsenal of weapons, each with a totally different move set.
Discover and utilize a reliquary's worth of unusual Sidearms to gain the advantage in combat.
Collect and equip Trinkets to acquire a variety of exotic effects. Level Mina up to suit your unique playstyle.
Electrifying MSX-style soundtrack by chiptune virtuoso, Jake Kaufman.
Descend into the depths of madness with a bone-chilling, yet heartwarming tale inspired by Victorian Gothic horror.
Explore a huge, dark world brimming with secrets, challenging battles, and interconnected level design.
70010000081412.intro: A bone-chilling 8-bit action adventure, refined for the modern era.
70010000081412.name: Mina the Hollower

70010000091026.description:
Va-room! 

The Rescue Wheels crew is revved up and ready to race! Join Chase, Skye, Marshall, Rubble, Zuma, Rocky, and Roxi, in epic races across Adventure Bay and beyond. You can even cause mischief with Boomer & Frank or Mayor Humdinger.

Pick your Pup Racer, each with unique skills like launching tennis balls or spinning out rivals. Master drifting, turbo boosts, and epic signature stunts to rule the dirt roads. Play solo or challenge friends in multiplayer—every racer can be a champion!

Grab your best Pup Pals and let’s Rox and roll!

RACE WITH NEW FACES: Play with the Rescue Wheels crew, including Roxi, Boomer and Mayor Humdinger. 

MONSTER TRUCK MAYHEM: Bulldozer, Hovercraft, Jet. Which one will you choose to help you win the championship?

STUNT TO THE FINISH LINE: Perform tricks mid-air to get a boost and unlock your Pup’s signature stunt. 

PUP POWER-UPS: Get ahead of the competition by collecting Pup Treats and objects.

DRIFT INTO THE ACTION TOGETHER: Speed through arenas across Adventure Bay, the Jungle, Foggy Bottom, and beyond in multiplayer
70010000091026.intro: Race with the Rescue Wheels crew! Choose your Pup, unleash epic stunts, and drift to victory solo or with friends. Speed to victory!
70010000091026.name: PAW Patrol™ Rescue Wheels™: Championship

70010000097173.description:
Step into a world overrun by the undead, where survival is the ultimate challenge. In DeadZone: Survival Ops Zombie Shooter, you’ll face relentless waves of zombies in fast-paced, adrenaline-fueled combat. Every shot counts, every decision matters, and only the sharpest, fastest, and smartest will make it through the chaos.

Loot valuable chests, discover unique abilities, and unleash the Upgrade System to transform your weapons into devastating tools of destruction. Collect Survival Points from every kill and invest them in critical upgrades to suit your own playstyle, from aggressive firepower to strategic defense. Navigate multiple danger zones by helicopter—but make sure you’ve got the fuel, or it could be your last trip.

Key Features:

- Intense arcade-style FPS zombie combat
- Powerful weapon upgrades via the Upgrade system
- Tactical gadgets: traps, grenades, and fully customizable loadouts
- Survival Points for progression, skills, and abilities
- Immersive post-apocalyptic maps filled with hidden dangers and surprises

The undead are everywhere, and the city is collapsing around you. Every encounter tests your reflexes, strategy, and nerve. Gear up, fight back, and prove you have what it takes to survive the DeadZone—or be consumed by it.
70010000097173.intro: The city falls, the dead rise—your survival is all that matters.
70010000097173.name: DeadZone: Survival Ops Zombie Shooter

70010000100408.description:
Enter the relentless world of Releaseburg, a rogue-like survival shooter set in a post-apocalyptic city consumed by chaos. The streets run red as hordes of grotesque zombies rise from the ruins, turning every encounter into a brutal test of skill, precision, and nerve.

Master the unique release-based shooting system that rewards timing, focus, and control. From quick pistol bursts to devastating rifle shots, every weapon demands mastery. Adapt your strategy, navigate procedurally generated cityscapes, and face wave after wave of merciless enemies eager to drag you into the abyss.

Each run offers new challenges, weapons, and paths to survival — no two journeys through Releaseburg are ever the same. In this world of blood and decay, your aim is your lifeline… and hesitation is death.

- Rogue-Like Intensity: No two runs are alike – each playthrough delivers fresh layouts, enemies, and challenges.
- Release-Based Shooting: Master precision timing to unleash powerful attacks and control every battle.
- Diverse Arsenal: Choose from pistols, rifles, and burst-fire weapons to suit your combat style.
- Adaptive Combat: Face a variety of enemy types, each demanding unique tactics and quick thinking.
-Brutal Atmosphere: Experience a blood-soaked urban wasteland brought to life with visceral visuals and sound.
-Endless Replayability: Procedural levels and evolving encounters ensure constant tension and discovery.
70010000100408.intro:
The purge is over. The nightmare begins.
Every bullet counts. Every mistake kills.
Welcome to Releaseburg.
70010000100408.name: Releaseburg

70010000103478.description:
Are you ready to own the world's best laundry store? Transform a small laundry shop into a laundry empire!

Discover the following features in Laundry Store Simulator:

Build a small laundry store into a thriving business empire! Upgrade your equipment, design and expand your store, hire staff, and more!

Upgrade your equipment to provide exceptional cleaning services! Invest in high-quality washing machines, dryers, ironing equipment, and even automated washing machines!

Create a stylish and inviting space to attract customers! Provide comfortable seating, warm decorations, and more funsies to welcome your customers!

Grow your laundry business by unlocking new areas and features, offering complimentary services to attract more customers!

Build a dedicated team to manage your laundry store efficiently! Hire qualified and experienced staff laundry attendants, such as, washers, dryers, and more!

Boost your profits by selling cleaning supplies and becoming a one-stop shop for laundry needs! Offer a variety of cleaning products, including detergents, fabric softeners, stain removers, and more!

Unleash your creativity by designing custom shirts for unique customers! Draw anything, print it, and watch them proudly wear your creations in style!
70010000103478.name: Laundry Store Simulator

70010000105445.description:
In Goat Out of Hell, you take on the role of a guardian goat responsible for guiding the souls of pets that ended up in the wrong place after death. Your challenge is to push and place these souls on sacred altars to restore order, exploring stages filled with lava, rocks, marble columns, and unexpected traps.
The gameplay follows the classic block-pushing puzzle style but with a special twist: besides moving marble blocks and organizing the pets, you must also fill holes to clear paths through dangerous areas of hell. Each move demands strategy and patience, since a single mistake can cost all your progress.
With 30 levels spread across two unique settings, the game begins in the fiery Entrance of Hell, full of bubbling lava, and advances to the imposing Temple of Hell, a dark yet refined place with marble columns and flaming pyres.
Relax, rethink your moves, and challenge your logic in an adventure that blends brain-teasing puzzles, infernal atmosphere, and plenty of charm in every stage.
70010000105445.intro: The Best Guardian Goat of the Underworld
70010000105445.name: Goat Out Of Hell

70010000106600.description:
People used to say that parrots aren't real pirates, that they only belong perched on a captain’s shoulder.

But one particularly ambitious parrot is in search of his own treasures and adventures to become a true pirate, a Beaked Buccaneer!

Explore four different pirate-themed worlds with alternative paths, and defeat the infamous Captain Smelly and his nefarious crew.


Features:
* Metroidvania gameplay
* Colorful 8-bit style graphics
* Four different pirate-themed worlds
* Equipment upgrades and leveling
* Battle pirates and discover treasure
70010000106600.name: Beaked Buccaneer

70010000107303.description:
The gates are locked, the line is long, and the air is thick with tension—and possibly zombie breath. You’re the last barrier between the living and the undead, armed with scanners, test kits, and a gut feeling that might save the world.

Every day, a parade of desperate faces shuffles toward your checkpoint—some harmless, some sick, and some hiding something far worse. One wrong call, and you might just let a walking biohazard waltz right in.

Inspect every ID, scan every bag, and keep an eye on that guy who’s sweating way too much for a chilly day. Supplies are scarce, time is short, and the infected are getting clever. Upgrade your gear, train your instincts, and hold your ground as the outbreak evolves.

The fate of humanity is in your hands—so no pressure. Just remember: if someone starts groaning and craving brains, that’s not your cue to hand them a visitor’s badge.
70010000107303.name: Quarantine Area: Zombie Lockdown

70010000107785.description:
The old castle has crumbled, leaving only dangerous platforms, tricky jumps, and daring parkour challenges behind. Your goal? Scale the ruins and make it all the way to the top!

Features:
>Fun and challenging obby / parkour gameplay

>A towering castle climb full of obstacles

>Checkpoints to help you keep progressing

>Beautiful hand crafted world

Do you have the skill (and the courage) to master the climb and claim victory at the peak?
70010000107785.name: Castle Climb Obby

70010000107875.description:
Get ready for a ghoulishly good time with Pumpkin Smash, the Halloween arcade adventure perfect for preschoolers!

Based on the classic carnival game, little ones will love whacking and smashing playful pumpkins as they pop up from their spooky hiding spots. Tap the right button in time to score points and race to be the first to reach 1000! But watch out – a tricky skull might appear! Only smash the friendly pumpkins to keep your score climbing.

With three gentle difficulty modes and both single-player and two-player options, Pumpkin Smash is the perfect first video game for young players.

Grab your virtual mallet and join the family-friendly Halloween party today!

• Perfect for Preschoolers: Simple, intuitive gameplay designed for young players.
• Spooky & Sweet: A festive Halloween theme with friendly graphics and no scary surprises.
• Two Game Modes: Play against the computer or challenge a sibling or parent in versus mode!
• Three Gentle Difficulties: Adjust the challenge to perfectly match your child's skill level.
• Develops Skills: A fun way to practice timing, coordination, and quick thinking.
70010000107875.intro: Spooky Fun for Little Ghouls & Boos!
70010000107875.name: Learn to Play - Pumpkin Smash!

70050000060833.description:
Receive the Super Adventuring Assistance Set early in your Tales of Xillia Remastered journey.

Content includes:
• Apple Gel x 10
• Orange Gel x 10
• Life Bottle x 10
• Panacea Bottle x 10

*This set can be obtained through normal progression.
70050000060833.name: Tales of Xillia Remastered - Super Adventuring Assistance Set

70050000060914.description:
A set of red herbs that permanently boosts a character’s stats in Tales of Xillia Remastered.

Content includes:
• Red Sage x 15
• Red Savory x 15
• Red Rosemary x 15
• Red Lavender x 15
• Red Verbena x 15
• Red Chamomile x 15
• Red Basil x 15
• Red Saffron x 15
• Red Jasmine x 15

*This set can be obtained through normal progression.
70050000060914.name: Tales of Xillia Remastered - Super Growth Support Herb Set

70050000060915.description:
Switch up in-game battle music in Tales of Xillia Remastered with tracks from previous games from the Tales of series.

*This set can be obtained through normal progression.
70050000060915.name: Tales of Xillia Remastered - Battle BGM Pack

70070000029946.description:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- Tales of Xillia Remastered
- Battle BGM pack
- Digital Artbook & Soundtrack
- Super Growth Support Herb Set

Experience Tales of Xillia, remastered for the first time ever.

Dive into the magnificent world of Rieze Maxia as either Jude Mathis, an aspiring medical student from the capital, or Milla Maxwell, a mysterious woman accompanied by four powerful spirits.

Worlds Collide, Destiny Awaits

• Two Heroes, One Destiny
Follow the paths of Milla and Jude as they embark on their daring journey through Rieze Maxia, a wondrous land where mankind and spirits coexist in harmony.

• Partner Up with Dual Raid
Master the Dual Raid Linear Motion Battle System, mustering strategy and coordination to overcome action-packed battles in real-time combat. Team up with allies to unleash devastating combo attacks and unlock special support skills to overwhelm your foes.

• Witness the Dramatic Story with High-Quality Animation
Visit the gorgeous Rieze Maxia, revitalized by beautifully-rendered illustrations and animations.

• Quality of Life Upgrades
Explore with new quality-of-life updates including improved graphics, an auto-save feature, the ability to toggle encounters, early shop access, and more.

• An All-Around Experience
Xillia Remastered contains DLC launched alongside the original release, including costumes, useful items, and other fun extras.

*A Standard Edition is also available. Be careful of duplicate purchases.
70070000029946.name: Tales of Xillia Remastered Deluxe Edition

70070000031802.description:
A wild rain of bouncing rocks crashes down - move fast, blast faster!

Every rock has a number - hit it that many times and boom! it splits into two rocks with half the number and double the speed, turning the field into fast-moving chaos!

Play solo or with a friend for double firepower. Beat hundreds of levels, survive endless waves, and climb the world leaderboard!

Pick up coins and unlock new cannons: a wide-spread shotgun, a boomerang that swings back and spinning saw blades that slice through rocks as they fall. Upgrade power-ups like a piercing laser beam, explosive drones, and huge shockwaves to wipe out waves in a flash!

Features:
- 3 New Halloween Maps: Blast your way through Haunted Castle, Candy Land and Vaporwave map!
- CO-OP: Team up with a friend and fend off the falling rocks together!
- Online Leaderboards: Survive as long as you can and get the best score in the world!
- Powerful Cannons: Choose between basic, shotgun, boomerang, and saw cannons!
- Devastating powers: Buy and upgrade powerful abilities to destroy everything!
- Special Levels: Defeat epic bosses and protect the bridge from destruction!
- 6 Extra Cannon Boosters: Amplify your firepower!
- 15 Boomerang Shards
- 10 Shock Wave Shards
- 10 Laser Shards
- 2500 gems: Spend extra gems on crates, fresh shards, and more power-ups!
- Replayability: Complete hundreds of unique levels and challenges!

The rocks won’t stop bouncing - are you ready to keep blasting?
70070000031802.intro: Dodge falling rocks and blast them all!
70070000031802.name: Ball Blast: Halloween Edition

70070000031807.description:
Enjoy your short life as a hot dog playing SOLO or with FRIENDS! (up to 8 players)

This edition includes:
- base game with 150 deadly levels and tasty powerups
- fresh sausage pack of 9 new skins (Brain Monster, Eye Monster, Xray Monster, Angel, Astronaut, Devil, Caveman, Witch, Teacher)

Choose your sausage and run for your life! This race is a hot dog’s dream - or nightmare - depending on how well you do.
70070000031807.intro: The most exciting sausage race in the world! Let the bodies hit the floor in a ketchup bath!
70070000031807.name: Run Sausage Run!: Hella Weenies Edition

70070000031819.description:
Grab your bricks, get building, and race to the finish line before your rivals even lay their first stone! Collect bricks of your color and build your bridge to the next level. Got some extra bricks? Use them to expand your castle and unlock quirky new brick designs!

This bundle includes:
- Bridge Race
- Bridge Race: Spooky DLC
- Bridge Race: Funny DLC

NEW VERSUS MODE FOR UP TO 4 PLAYERS!
Compete with your friends in an exciting head-to-head split-screen showdown. Choose your custom color and unique skin, set the number of rounds, and let your building skills shine. Earn points each round based on your finish, and see who rises to the top of the leaderboard. Ready to show off your skills and claim victory? 

Features:
- 8 additional skins to show off your style!
- 20000 coins to help you on your journey!
- Build across endless levels of fun!
- Local multiplayer mode for up to 4 players!
- Customize your bricks and character for a unique look!
- Expand your castle with extra bricks!
- Challenge yourself in epic bonus and boss stages!

Want to slow the competition down? No problem! Trip them up and zoom ahead to claim first place. Crush those bonus levels to stack up coins, and then use them to unlock new skins and colors to show off your style!

Outbuild, outsmart, and outlast the competition—who knew building bridges could be this much fun?
70070000031819.intro: Build your way to victory, one brick at a time!
70070000031819.name: Bridge Race: Horror Edition

70070000031827.description:
Get ready for an action-packed challenge where every strike brings you closer to victory! Join friends or family in up to four-player matches, compete in thrilling tournaments against top bowlers from across the lanes, and bowl in amazing alleys with cool views. Only the best players make it to the final rounds – will you be the one holding the trophy?

Features:
• Premium gear - Choose from 3 new pieces of gear with powerful buffs!
• Powerful Halloween Balls - Equip 3 new spooky bowling balls with unique trails and more power!
• Extra currency - Get 150K coins and 1K gems to buy and upgrade your gear!
• Local multiplayer - Compete against your friends and family in matches for up to 4 players!
• Exciting Tournaments - Compete in rounds and aim for the finals, where only the best bowlers make it.
• Customize Your Character - Personalize your bowler with cool gear, such as gloves and shoes.
• Challenging Arenas - Unlock amazing new alleys with fun twists as you level up.
• Powerful Skills - Use active and passive skills to boost your chances of winning!

Skyline Bowling isn’t just about throwing the ball; it’s about using the right gear and clever strategies! Boost your skills with special gear like gloves that give your ball extra spin or shoes that make it roll faster. Choose from different bowling balls, and earn experience to unlock new tournaments and amazing bowling alleys with fun surprises! Collect skills to help you get even more strikes. Are you ready to bowl your way to the top?

Get ready to roll, aim, and strike your way to victory in Skyline Bowling!
70070000031827.intro: Strike out the competition and become the ultimate bowling champ! Ready to roll?
70070000031827.name: Skyline Bowling: Spooky Edition

70010000094936.description:
“Rise from your bed…”
Those are the words V, an overworked wife and mother, hears as she wakes up in her worst nightmare: she has been cursed and trapped inside a video game by a mysterious entity. To escape this chaotic low-poly world filled with odd creatures, she must crush every foe that dares cross her path. She has a frying pan. She has rage. And she will beat them all.

V’s Rage is a hand-drawn action-adventure that pays homage to classic arcade hits of the '80s and '90s, and to anime from the same era.

Switch between four distinct play styles—beat ’em up, shoot ’em up, side-scroller, and run-and-gun—as V smashes, blasts, and dashes through a kaleidoscope of bizarre stages.
70010000094936.intro: Trapped in a video game and armed with a frying pan.
70010000094936.name: V’s Rage

70010000110070.description:
Take off in seconds—master the skies for a lifetime. Easy Flight Simulator 2 blends pick-up-and-play controls with surprisingly accurate flight dynamics. Choose from 4 distinct aircraft, explore 12 hand-crafted maps with dynamic weather, and experience endlessly fresh runs thanks to AI-generated levels that evolve every time you play.

Whether you’re skimming coastlines at sunset or threading through mountain valleys on a rainy day, the cockpit is always open.

No manuals required.
70010000110070.intro: Take off in seconds. Explore forever.
70010000110070.name: Easy Flight Simulator 2

70010000088254.description:
Whether you're warming up your vocal cords solo, teaming up in duets, or competing with friends, Let’s Sing 2026 delivers an unbeatable playlist, and endless entertainment!

Featuring 35 chart-topping songs there's something for everyone—from modern hits to timeless classics.

- Billie Eilish – BIRDS OF A FEATHER
- Chappell Roan – HOT TO GO!
- Lewis Capaldi – Wish You The Best
- Gracie Abrams – I Love You, I’m Sorry
- Coldplay – ALL MY LOVE
- Noah Kahan – Stick Season
- Benson Boone – Slow It Down
...And many more!

Key Features:
* Sing along to official music videos for an authentic experience
* 4 exciting game modes for solo players and groups
* Up to 4-player support – perfect for parties and family gatherings
* Use your smartphone as a mic with the free companion app
* 1-month FREE VIP Pass included – unlock 180+ additional songs
* Whether you're a first-time performer or a karaoke king or queen, Let’s Sing 2026 invites you to step into the spotlight.

Get ready to take the stage!

This product is not sold on its own.
70010000088254.intro: The global karaoke party returns with Let’s Sing 2026, your ultimate ticket to fun-filled nights and unforgettable performances.
70010000088254.name: Let's Sing 2026

70050000059614.description:
The Let's Sing VIP Pass is an online subscription service that provides access to more than 180 songs with the launch of Let's Sing 2026.

Awards for one month. 

This product is not sold on its own.
70050000059614.intro: Expand your song library with access to more than 180 hit songs with the VIP Pass!
70050000059614.name: Let's Sing 2026 - VIP Pass Free Trial

Whether you're warming up your vocal cords solo, teaming up in duets, or competing with friends, Let’s Sing 2026 delivers an unbeatable playlist, and endless entertainment!
